title: midday_soil_surface_condition_dry_vegetable_plot
summary: Midday observation of soil surface condition in a vegetable plot.
description: This data unit documents the visible soil surface condition in a vegetable plot during midday. The soil surface appears dry with no visible surface moisture at the time of observation. This record is contextually linked to a nearby environmental temperature and humidity measurement.

external_reference.note: External reference provided for verification only.
